Package fr.emse.simulator.astar

This package contains all the utilities for performing a a-star search in a SimulationMap.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Heuristic
    This interface is used to represent a generic heuristic, computed using Heuristic.getGlobalCost(SimulationMap, LocalCost, Cell, Cell).
    LocalCost
    This interface is used to compute the cost of moving through a cell.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AStarPathFinder
    This class compute a classical pathfinding algorithm (a-star) in a given SimulationMap and using a given Heuristic, using a grid of nodes to memorize the paths.
    EuclideanDistanceHeuristic
    This class embeds a heuristic using the Euclidean distance between two cells.
    ManhattanDistanceHeuristic  
    Node
    This class is used to represent a node in a search graph like in the a-star algorithm.
    PreferEmptyCellsLocalCost
    This class implements a local cost as to prefer empty cells (cost min) than occupied one (cost max).
    SortedList<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    This class represents a sorted list of Comparable.

Package fr.emse.simulator.astar Description

This package contains all the utilities for performing a a-star search in a SimulationMap.
